title: Help Rito PLS!
body:
My league lately for the past few weeks hasn't been working normally...
It always has been the first games when it doesn't pass through the loading screen. The peculiar part about this is that the games let me pass through after 3 minutes of the game when surrender vote passes and it'll give me a leaver. Note that this always happens on the first games after that it's back to normal... Also note that I have repaired the files countless times, changed the DNS server, re-download the client a few times, and checked my internet if it is the source of problem. I can't find a diagnosis and I want your support to fix this issue.  I'm being punished severely unintentionally and please fix this. I am not a technician or a programmer so I need your help for this


Sincerely and Frankly, Rocketeer2606

replies.body:
Every time I've seen this, it's been caused by missing assets in League preventing you from loading in a match until it's had a chance to grab the files and cache them in memory. I'd recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League can properly save and load files. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
